languages.text: Выстрелы из некоторого оружия могут пронзать противников насквозь и наносить {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g} также дополнительным целям, стоящим позади основной. Параметр {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g} есть у большинства видов оружия. Он определяет, сколько урона получает цель, а также вероятность {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}сквозного пробития{/g}. У некоторого оружия есть параметр сквозное пробитие, который зависит от типа оружия, значения {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробития брони{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантов{/g} персонажа. При сквозном пробитии персонажи, стоящие позади, получают меньше урона, чем основная цель.
languages.original_text: Some shots are able to pierce enemies through and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} not only to them, but also to the characters standing behind them. The {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Armour Penetration{/g} parameter is found on most weapons and affects how much damage the target takes as well as determines the chance of Overpenetration. Some weapons have the Overpenetration parameter, which depends on the type of weapon, the value of the Armour Penetration parameter, and the character's talents. In case of Overpenetration, characters standing behind the target will receive less damage.

traits.locale_text:
Некоторые выстрелы способны пронзать врагов насквозь и наносить {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g} не только им, но и стоящим позади персонажам.
Параметр {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g} есть у большинства видов оружия. Он влияет на то, сколько урона получит цель, а также определяет шанс сквозного пробития.
Сквозное пробитие — еще один параметр, которым обладают некоторые виды оружия. Он зависит от типа оружия, показателя пробития брони, а также талантов персонажа.
При сквозном пробитии персонажи, стоящие позади, получат меньше урона, чем основная цель.

Некоторые выстрелы способны пронзать врагов насквозь и наносить {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g} не только им, но и стоящим позади персонажам.
Параметр {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g} есть у большинства видов оружия. Он влияет на то, сколько урона получит цель, а также определяет шанс сквозного пробития.
Сквозное пробитие — еще один параметр, которым обладают некоторые виды оружия. Он зависит от типа оружия, показателя пробития брони, а также талантов персонажа.
При сквозном пробитии персонажи, стоящие позади, получат меньше урона, чем основная цель.

languages.text: Some shots are able to pierce enemies through and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} not only to them but also to the characters standing behind them. The {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} parameter is found on most weapons and affects how much damage the target takes as well as determines the chance of {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}overpenetration{/g}. Some weapons have the overpenetration parameter, which depends on the type of weapon, the value of the weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} parameter, and the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}. In case of overpenetration, characters standing behind the target will receive less damage.
languages.original_text: Выстрелы из некоторого оружия могут пронзать противников насквозь и наносить {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g} также дополнительным целям, стоящим позади основной. Параметр {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g} есть у большинства видов оружия. Он определяет, сколько урона получает цель, а также вероятность {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}сквозного пробития{/g}. У некоторого оружия есть параметр сквозное пробитие, который зависит от типа оружия, значения {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробития брони{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантов{/g} персонажа. При сквозном пробитии персонажи, стоящие позади, получают меньше урона, чем основная цель.

traits.locale_text:
Some shots can pierce through the target and deal damage to enemies standing behind them.
Most weapons have the Armour Penetration parameter — it affects how much damage the target will receive in case of a hit. In addition, some weapons have the Overpenetration parameter — it indicates the chance to make a through shot. It depends on the type of weapon, the value of the Armor Penetration parameter, as well as the character's talents.
Enemies standing behind will take less damage from the shot than the main target.

Some shots are able to pierce enemies through and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} not only to them but also to the characters standing behind them. The {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} parameter is found on most weapons and affects how much damage the target takes as well as determines the chance of overpenetration. Some weapons have the overpenetration parameter, which depends on the type of weapon, the value of the weapon's armour penetration parameter, and the character's talents. In case of overpenetration, characters standing behind the target will receive less damage.

Some shots are able to pierce enemies through and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} not only to them but also to the characters standing behind them. The {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} parameter is found on most weapons and affects how much damage the target takes as well as determines the chance of {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}overpenetration{/g}. Some weapons have the overpenetration parameter, which depends on the type of weapon, the value of the weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} parameter, and the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}. In case of overpenetration, characters standing behind the target will receive less damage.

Some shots are able to pierce enemies through and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} not only to them but also to the characters standing behind them. The {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} parameter is found on most weapons and affects how much damage the target takes as well as determines the chance of {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}overpenetration{/g}. Some weapons have the overpenetration parameter, which depends on the type of weapon, the value of the weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} parameter, and the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}. In case of overpenetration, characters standing behind the target will receive less damage.

languages.text: Algunos disparos pueden atravesar enemigos e infligir {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}daño{/g} también a los personajes que haya detrás. El parámetro de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} está presente en la mayoría de armas y afecta a la cantidad de daño que recibe el objetivo y determina la probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}sobrepenetración{/g}. Algunas armas tienen el parámetro sobrepenetración, que depende del tipo de arma, su valor de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} y los {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} del personaje. Si se produce una sobrepenetración, los personajes que se encuentren detrás del objetivo recibirán una parte del daño.
languages.original_text: Some shots are able to pierce enemies through and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} not only to them but also to the characters standing behind them. The {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} parameter is found on most weapons and affects how much damage the target takes as well as determines the chance of {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}overpenetration{/g}. Some weapons have the overpenetration parameter, which depends on the type of weapon, the value of the weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} parameter, and the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}. In case of overpenetration, characters standing behind the target will receive less damage.

traits.locale_text: Algunos disparos pueden atravesar enemigos e infligir {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}daño{/g} también a los personajes que haya detrás. El parámetro de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} está presente en la mayoría de armas y afecta a la cantidad de daño que recibe el objetivo y determina la probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}sobrepenetración{/g}. Algunas armas tienen el parámetro sobrepenetración, que depende del tipo de arma, su valor de penetración de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} y los {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} del personaje. Si se produce una sobrepenetración, los personajes que se encuentren detrás del objetivo recibirán una parte del daño.

languages.text: 一部のショットは敵を貫通し、後ろに立っているキャラクターにも{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ{/g}を与えることができる。. {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}パラメータはほとんどの武器にあり、ターゲットが受けるダメージの大きさに影響を与えるだけでなく、{g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}過貫通{/g}の確率も決定する。. 一部の武器には過貫通パラメータがあり、これは武器の種類、武器の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}パラメータの値、およびキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}才能{/g}によって異なる。. 過貫通の場合、ターゲットの後ろに立っているキャラクターはダメージを受けにくくなる。
languages.original_text: Some shots are able to pierce enemies through and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} not only to them but also to the characters standing behind them. The {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} parameter is found on most weapons and affects how much damage the target takes as well as determines the chance of {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}overpenetration{/g}. Some weapons have the overpenetration parameter, which depends on the type of weapon, the value of the weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} parameter, and the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}. In case of overpenetration, characters standing behind the target will receive less damage.

traits.locale_text: 一部のショットは敵を貫通し、後ろに立っているキャラクターにも{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ{/g}を与えることができる。 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}パラメータはほとんどの武器にあり、ターゲットが受けるダメージの大きさに影響を与えるだけでなく、{g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}過貫通{/g}の確率も決定する。 一部の武器には過貫通パラメータがあり、これは武器の種類、武器の{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}貫通パラメータの値、およびキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}によって異なる。 過貫通の場合、ターゲットの後ろに立っているキャラクターはダメージを受けにくくなる。

languages.text: 部分射击可以穿透敌人，不仅会命中目标敌人，还会对目标身后的角色造成{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}。 绝大多数武器都有{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}属性，此属性会影响目标受到的最终伤害，还会影响{g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}过度穿透{/g}的几率。 部分武器拥有过度穿透属性，此属性取决于武器类型、武器的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}值，以及角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}效果。 如果射击造成了过度穿透，则子弹同样会击中目标后方的角色，但造成的伤害会略有降低。
languages.original_text: Some shots are able to pierce enemies through and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} not only to them but also to the characters standing behind them. The {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} parameter is found on most weapons and affects how much damage the target takes as well as determines the chance of {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}overpenetration{/g}. Some weapons have the overpenetration parameter, which depends on the type of weapon, the value of the weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} parameter, and the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}. In case of overpenetration, characters standing behind the target will receive less damage.

traits.locale_text: 部分射击可以穿透敌人，不仅会命中目标敌人，还会对目标身后的角色造成{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}。 绝大多数武器都有{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}属性，此属性会影响目标受到的最终伤害，还会影响{g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}过度穿透{/g}的几率。 部分武器拥有过度穿透属性，此属性取决于武器类型、武器的{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲穿透{/g}值，以及角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}效果。 如果射击造成了过度穿透，则子弹同样会击中目标后方的角色，但造成的伤害会略有降低。

languages.text: Einige Schüsse können Gegner durchdringen, um auch hinter ihnen stehenden Charakteren {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Schaden{/g} zuzufügen. Der Parameter {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} findet sich bei den meisten Waffen. Er beeinflusst, wie viel Schaden das Ziel einsteckt und bestimmt die Chance auf {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}Überdurchdringung{/g}. Einige Waffen haben den Parameter Überdurchdringung, der vom Waffentyp, dem Wert des Parameters {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} der Waffe sowie den {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talenten{/g} des Charakters abhängt. Wird Überdurchdringung ausgelöst, erleiden Charaktere hinter dem Ziel weniger Schaden.
languages.original_text: Some shots are able to pierce enemies through and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} not only to them but also to the characters standing behind them. The {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} parameter is found on most weapons and affects how much damage the target takes as well as determines the chance of {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}overpenetration{/g}. Some weapons have the overpenetration parameter, which depends on the type of weapon, the value of the weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} parameter, and the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}. In case of overpenetration, characters standing behind the target will receive less damage.

traits.locale_text: Einige Schüsse sind in der Lage, Gegner zu durchdringen und nicht nur ihnen, sondern auch den hinter ihnen stehenden Charakteren {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Schaden{/g} zuzufügen. Der Parameter {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} findet sich bei den meisten Waffen und beeinflusst, wie viel Schaden das Ziel einsteckt, und bestimmt die Chance auf {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}Überdurchdringung{/g}. Einige Waffen haben den Parameter Überdurchdringung, der vom Waffentyp, dem Wert des Parameters {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} der Waffe sowie den {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talenten{/g} des Charakters abhängt. Falls Überdurchdringung ausgelöst wird, erhalten Charaktere, die hinter dem Ziel stehen, weniger Schaden.

languages.text: Certains tirs peuvent transpercer les ennemis et leur infliger des {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dégâts{/g}, de même qu'aux personnages situés derrière eux. La plupart des armes ont un paramètre de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} qui détermine la quantité de dégâts infligés à la cible ainsi que les chances de {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}surpénétration{/g}. Certaines armes ont un paramètre de surpénétration qui dépend de leur type, de la valeur de la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} de l'arme et des {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} du personnage. En cas de surpénétration, les personnages situés derrière la cible subissent moins de dégâts.
languages.original_text: Some shots are able to pierce enemies through and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} not only to them but also to the characters standing behind them. The {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} parameter is found on most weapons and affects how much damage the target takes as well as determines the chance of {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}overpenetration{/g}. Some weapons have the overpenetration parameter, which depends on the type of weapon, the value of the weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} parameter, and the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}. In case of overpenetration, characters standing behind the target will receive less damage.

traits.locale_text: Certains tirs peuvent transpercer les ennemis et leur infliger des {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dégâts{/g}, de même qu'aux personnages situés derrière eux. Le paramètre de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} se trouve sur la plupart des armes et affecte le volume de dégâts infligés à la cible ainsi que les chances de {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}surpénétration{/g}. Certaines armes ont un paramètre de surpénétration qui dépend de leur type, de la valeur du paramètre de pénétration d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de l'arme et des {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} du personnage. En cas de surpénétration, les personnages situés derrière la cible subissent moins de dégâts.

languages.text: Bazı atışlar düşmanları delip geçerek yalnızca onlara değil, arkalarında duran karakterlere de {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}hasar{/g} verebilirler. {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Zırh delme{/g} parametresi çoğu silahta bulunur ve hedefin ne kadar hasar alacağını etkilediği gibi {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}delip geçme{/g} olasılığını da belirler. Bazı silahlar; silahın türüne, silahın {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} parametresinin değerine ve karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}becerilerine{/g} bağlı olan delip geçme parametresine sahiptir. Delip geçme durumunda, hedefin arkasında duran karakterler daha az hasar alır.
languages.original_text: Some shots are able to pierce enemies through and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} not only to them but also to the characters standing behind them. The {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} parameter is found on most weapons and affects how much damage the target takes as well as determines the chance of {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}overpenetration{/g}. Some weapons have the overpenetration parameter, which depends on the type of weapon, the value of the weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} parameter, and the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}. In case of overpenetration, characters standing behind the target will receive less damage.
